detail_desc: Long gloves in supple leather with a soft suede inset section along the shaft, decorative seams on the uppers and a cotton jersey lining.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Scarf in an airy, patterned weave with short fringes along the sides.
Short, high-waisted skirt in a textured weave with a sheen. Pleats at the top, a concealed zip at the back, and side pockets. Unlined.
Jacket in a textured cotton blend with peak lapels, a button at the front, welt front pockets and long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Short-sleeved dress in soft jersey with a round neck, print motif on the front and a gathered, elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a decorative back pocket. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Metal waist belt with an elastic strap and metal fastener at the back. Width 2.5 cm.
Make-up bag in transparent plastic with a zip at the top. Size 9x9.5x18 cm.
Fitted cardigan in a fine, fluffy knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Elasticated waistband with a drawstring, and diagonal side pockets.
Coat in a stretch, checked weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and buttons down the front. Welt front pockets, two inner pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey.
Short dress in taffeta. Straight cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Seam under the bust and at the waist for added width and soft draping. Lined at the top.

Gift set for newborns in soft, organic cotton jersey comprising two long-sleeved wrapover bodysuits, a pair of trousers with full feet, a hat and a blanket. Bodysuits with press-studs at the side and crotch. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.
Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket denim jeans with ultra-flexible stretch that keeps them in shape while providing full movement and optimum comfort. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Short, voluminous dress with a deep V-neck that has a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. 3/4-length puff sleeves with cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Body in crêpe jersey with a U-shaped decoration at the top, a detachable strap at the back of the neck, concealed silicone trim at the top and press-studs at the crotch.
Hair grips in metal decorated with rhinestones. Length 7 cm. Width approx. 1.5 cm.

Dress in washed denim made from a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Padded jacket in a slightly longer style with a stand-up collar and faux fur-trimmed hood. Zip down the front, a concealed drawstring at the waist, and zipped side pockets. Lined.

Shell trousers in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams. Adjustable elasticated waist, a reflective strip on one leg and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Brogue-patterned trainers in imitation suede with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with press-studs at the back and a collar and skirt in tulle with lace embroidery. The skirt has a jersey lining.
T-shirt in soft, printed slub-cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.

Short, sleeveless dress in jersey crêpe with a small opening at the front and button at the neckline, and a double-layered, gathered yoke at the shoulders and back. Seam and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist.
Jacket in soft pile with a high stand-up collar, concealed zip down the front, side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Glittery Alice band decorated with a velour Santa hat. Inside covered in grosgrain.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Large, block-coloured scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x200 cm.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with buttons on one shoulder, long sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Tops in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide, straight trousers in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and back pockets. Soft brushed inside.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Hat in a soft rib knit with reversible sequins. Pompom in a contrasting colour on the top. Jersey lining.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Straight-cut blouse in a textured silk and organic cotton weave with an opening with a button at the back of the neck and asymmetric cut at the waist. Long sleeves with flared, buttoned cuffs and a wide flounce on one sleeve. Frayed edges.
Asymmetric skirt in a patterned, textured weave with a concealed zip in one side, a seam in the middle and gentle flare to the hem. Unlined.
Vest top in organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes. Regular fit.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and flared legs with raw-edge hems.
Shorter jumper knitted in a cotton blend with some textured-knit sections. Small stand-up collar with a roll edge, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Short jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, lightly brushed finish. Stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with hook and loop fasteners down the front, flap front pockets with press-studs and ribbing at the cuffs.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a V-shaped, mid waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Short dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a scallop-edged V-neck. Decorative buttons down the front, long sleeves with overlocked edges at the cuffs, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Short, straight-cut dress in jersey made from a cotton blend with short sleeves.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline, a gathered seam at the hips and a flare to the hem.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in soft, narrow-striped organic slub cotton jersey with a button placket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a drawstring at the waist.
Round earrings in snakeskin-patterned metal. Length 5 cm.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a concealed zip at the back, 3/4-length sleeves with inset, hemstitched trims at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Metal hair grips. Length 5 cm.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in a crêpe weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Straight-cut legs with creases that widen to the hem and have a high slit in one side.
Sandals with shimmering details. Ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, heel caps that are lightly padded at the top, and a small loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Sleeveless top in cotton jersey with a print motif. Frill trim around the armholes.
Tie-hem top in cotton jersey with a motif.
Slip-on trainers in cotton canvas with elastic gores in the sides and a grosgrain loop at the back. Twill linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front, lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a concealed button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit – a modern fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch washed denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.
Set with two long-sleeved tops and two pairs of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. Tops with lapped shoulders. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Long halterneck dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Open back, ties at the back of the neck, a wide, elasticated seam at the waist and a wrapover skirt. Lined at the top.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with frill-trimmed sleeves.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Baby Exclusive. Swim shorts with an elasticated waist and one back pocket with a button. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Knee-length football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and a print motif on one leg. Unlined.
Jacket in soft, thermal fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
A-line blouse in an airy viscose weave with a shirt front and long puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
